title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively. This behavior is unexpected.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, I notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively.
SR:
1. Open the control example
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
